author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This is a draft PR.

As reported in SIM meeting news (25 March), https://indico.cern.ch/event/1143277/, FastSim cmsDriver does not work. This PR is just the first attemp to make thing works. It will need more to review the result.
- The main issue comes from the interplay between `run3_common` and `fastSim` modifiers.
- It is not clear we should exclude GEM also as we did for Run-2. I just create FastSim era in the same way as Run_2 by excluding it. It may not need to exclude anymore.
- Maybe in the PR to merge, we should add a workflow of Run-3 FastSim.

#### PR validation:
The following cmsDriver run until end:
`cmsDriver.py TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi -s GEN,SIM,RECOBEFMIX,DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1,DIGI2RAW,L1Reco,RECO -n 10 --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --beamspot Run3RoundOptics25ns13TeVLowSigmaZ --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RECO --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --fast  --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3_FastSim --no_exec`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport and no need of backport
title: [Draft/Not to merge] To make FastSim work for Run-3
